benefitEquation: given 100 currency and 1 month = 1 point configure as (currentSubscriptionAmount/subscriptionValue/subscriptionPeriod)*currentSubscriptionPeriod eligible when currentSubscriptionAmount >= 1000 and (currentSubscriptionPeriod > 5 or totalLoyaltyPeriod > 5) apply as 1/2N, 3/4N delivery in 40, 60 proportion;
